about_the_game:
Value set of rare Mana Seeds and nostrums to aid you on your adventures. Nostrums can increase Adol and Karja's level by 1. (Max level is 99)

Unchanging Love
Star of the Grail+
Ascetic's Nostrum

*Can also be obtained in-game.
*Open [DLC] under [Items] in the main menu and select new items to receive them.
*Please note that all items in excess of the maximum amount will be lost.
